
.. _specscan:

************
specscan
************

:author: Stanislav Stoupin
:email:  <sstoupin@gmail.com>

extract individual scans from a file generated by SPEC

SYNOPSIS
============

::

       specscan [options] scan#1 scan#2... scan#N SPEC_file

DESCRIPTION
============

A program to extract individual scans from a multiscan file generated by SPEC control software

OPTIONS
============

:-v, --version:
       show version of program.

:-h, --help:
       show summary of options.

:-w, --write:
       write extracted scans into files scan#.dat (default - only display columns)

SEE ALSO
============

* :ref:`rcpeak`

:author: Stanislav Stoupin
:email:  <sstoupin@gmail.com>
:date: |today|
